sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click="apriFotocamera">Convalida</button>
    <video ref="video" autoplay playsinline=""></video>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "ApriFotocamera",
    async mounted() {
        
    },
    methods: {
        async apriFotocamera() {
            try {
                const stream = await navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia({
                    video: true
                });
                this.$refs.video.srcObject = stream;
            } catch(error) {
                console.error(error)
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
